Title: Fever Pitch
Writer: Lowell Ganz (screenplay), Babaloo Mandel (screenplay), Nick Hornby (novel)
Actors: Drew Barrymore, Jimmy Fallon, Jason Spevack, Jack Kehler
Plot: When relaxed and charming Ben Wrightman meets workaholic Lindsey Meeks she finds him sweet and charming, they hit it off and when it is winter Ben can spend every waking hour with Lindsey, but when summer comes around the corner Lindsey discovers Ben's obsession with the Boston Red Sox. She thinks it is perfect until everything goes downhill for them.
